attributes.action: Dissolve Children and Adolescents Mental Health Service
attributes.background: CAMHs are an inadequate service who continually let down vulnerable children and young people. It is almost impossible to meet their threshold, leaving victims and suffering children with nothing until their conditions worsen and become severe, even threatening loss of life.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because there is no single Children and Adolescents Mental Health Service. CAMHs a general term used to describe a range of services across the country. You can find out more here:

https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/nhs-services/mental-health-services/child-and-adolescent-mental-health-services-camhs/

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to hold a national review of the thresholds that NHS CAMHs services across England set to access their services if that is something you would like to see happen.
